message.body: I'm having a crap day/week... Just wanna disappear
I'm really sorry to hear that. Whats going on?
Well feel free to 'chat' about it if it makes you feel any better to get it off your chest. Thats what we're here for after all!

Thanks... I'm swamped at work.. And i missed 3 typis yesterday ... Creditors started calling my house for my sister who I don't even talk to.. I feel like my head is gonna explode... I need to clean the house badly but I don't have the time or energy.. I need a new car but I don't make enough money, I hate my hour commute to work, my boss doesn't know how to use her computer (why is she the boss????)... I need to lose weight but I'm in pain and exhaustedall the time so it's nearly impossible... Im not sleeping well... i had knee surgery in April and now the bills are coming in and im just supposed to pull the money out of my ass i guess...I'm telling you, I just want to curl into a ball and cry until I fade away...
And I made a ton of typos in that... Great
This week needs to be over
Wow, i'm sorry, that does sound like a lot to deal with. Do you have much in the way of family or community that you can lean on?
They are part of the problem
